Translations.Text: Y A S. (Kaaf Haa Yaa ‘Ayn Saad)
narration tvoj Lord's zlutovanie towards Jeho servant Zachariah
He vola sa jeho Lord secret vola sa
He said Moj Lord bones turned lamavy moj zbor moj chlp bol aflame s gray Mat Rad ja implore Ona moj Lord ja never zufalstvo
Ja znepokojit moj dependants mi, moj manzelka bol sterile Grant mna Ona heir
Let him je moj heir heir Jacob's rod robit him moj Lord acceptable
O Zachariah my dat ona dobry zvest chlapec vola sa bol Ahoj (Yahya). My never created ktokolvek him before
He said Moj Lord ja have syn moj manzelka sterility moj stara vek
He said Thus said tvoj Lord bol easy Mna robit. Ja created ona before ze, ona bol nothing
He said Moj Lord dat mna znamenie. He said Tvoj znamenie bol lenze ona nie speak do ludia 3 consecutive nights
He pod jeho rodina sanctuary signaled them Meditate God dni i night
O Ahoj ona uphold scripture strongly. My endowed him s wisdom, vecer jeho youth
A (my endowed him laskavo z us purity he bol righteous)
He honored jeho rodicia bol never disobedient tyrant
Peace je upon him dni he bol born dni he umrel dni he resurrected chrbat zivot
Zmierit Sa scripture Mary! Ona izolovat ju rodina eastern location
Chvila barrier separated ju z them my sent do ju our Spirit He ist ju v form human bol
Ona said ja seek refuge do the Vela Gracious ze ona bol righteous
He said ja bol posol tvoj Lord grant ona pure syn
Ona said Ako mozem ja have syn when ziaden clovek touched mna; ja never bol unchaste
He said Thus said tvoj Lord It bol easy for Mna. My render him znamenie ludia zlutovanie z us. This bol predestined zalezitost
When ona bore him ona izolovat faraway miesto
Narodenie process pojdem ju kufor palm strom Ona said (ja bol ashamed;) Ja zelat si ja bol dead before this happened completely zabudnut
infant vola sa ju ju saying nie rmutit sa! Tvoj Lord zadovazit ona stream
Ona shake kufor z this palm strom it pustit zrely datum ona
Jestn pne bol happy When ona see ktokolvek say ‘ja robit vow zahriaknut; ja nie talking dnes ktokolvek
Ona pojdem ju rodina beriem him. They said O Mary ona committed nieco bol totally unexpected
O descendant Aaron tvoj otca nie bol zly clovek nor bol tvoj matka unchaste
Ona pointed him. They said Ako my talk s infant crib
infant spoke said ja bol servant GOD He dat mi scripture appointed mna prophet
He robit mna zehnat wherever ja ist enjoined mna observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) mat rad long mat rad ja zivy
Ja je honor moj matka He nie robit mna disobedient rebel
peace je mi dni ja bol born dni ja umrel dni ja get resurrected
Je Jesus syn Mary this bol truth this zalezitost kto they zotrvat doubt
It nie befit GOD ze He begets syn He glorified Do have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
He i proclaimed GOD bol moj Lord tvoj Lord ona kult Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
(various parties disputed themselves zretel identita Jesus). Therefore woe do those disbelieve zrak hrozny dni
Cakat do ona hear them see them when they pojdem face us! transgressors ze dni totally lost
Warn them dni remorse when judgment issued They je totally oblivious; they nie verit
My je the jeden zdedit zem everyone it us everyone spatny listok
Zmierit Sa scripture Abraham; he bol saint prophet
He said do jeho otca O moj otca ona kult co mozem neither hear nor see nor pomoc ona v any way
O moj otca ja received certain znalost ze ona nie receive nasledovat mna ja guide ona straight chodnicek
O moj otca nie kult devil devil rebelled against the Vela Gracious
O moj otca ja fear lest ona incur retribution z the Vela Gracious potom become ally devil
He said ona forsaken moj gods O Abraham? Ona zastavit ja stone ona. vlavo mna
He said Peace bol ona. Ja implore moj Lord forgive ona; He bol Laskavy mna
Ja zhyraly ona gods ona kult GOD Ja kult len moj Lord By imploring moj Lord alone ja nie ist zlo
he zhyraly them gods they kult GOD my granted him Isaac Jacob my robit each z them prophet
My lejak them our zlutovanie my granted them honorable position history
Zmierit Sa scripture Moses He devoted he bol posol prophet
My vola sa him riadne strana Mount Sinai. My brought him confer him
A my granted him our zlutovanie jeho brat Aaron prophet
Zmierit Sa scripture Ismail! He bol truthful when he robit promise he bol posol prophet
He pouzivat enjoin jeho rodina observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat;) he bol acceptable do jeho Lord
Zmierit Sa scripture Idris! He bol saint prophet
My chov him honorable rank

These bol some z prophets koho GOD zehnat They zvolit si descendants Adam descendants z those my beriem Noah descendants z Abraham Izrael z those my guided selected When revelations the Vela Gracious som recited them they jesen prostrate weeping
After them He zastupid generations lost Zmluva Prayers (Salat) pursued ich lusts They suffer consequences
Len those repent verit lead righteous zivot zapisat Raj maly injustice
Zahrada Eden await them mat rad promised by the Vela Gracious those kult Him vecer privacy. Istota Jeho promise pojdem ist okolo
They nie hear any nonsense therein; len peace. They receive ich provisions therein dni i night
Such je Raj; my grant it those our servants bol righteous
My nie pod command tvoj Lord Do Him belongs our minuly our buduci everything medzi them! Tvoj Lord bol never zabudlivy
Lord z heavens zem everything them; ona kult Him steadfastly persevere do kult Him! Ona zauzlit z ktokolvek robit equals Him
human bol ziadat After ja umrel ja pod zivot
human bol zabudnut ze my robit created him already he bol nothing
By tvoj Lord my istota zvolat them dohromady devils zozbierat them around Hell humiliated
Potom my pick each zoskupit the vela zapalisty opponent z the Vela Gracious
My zauzlit full lepsie those bol zasluzit si z burning therein
Kazdy single 1 z ona see it this bol irrevocable decision tvoj Lord
Potom my zachranit righteous lavy transgressors it humiliated
When our revelations recited them clearly those disbelieve say do those verit Kto z us bol prosperous? Kto z us bol majority
Vela generation have my annihilated them; they bol mocny prosperous
Say Those zvolit si ist astray the Vela Gracious will lead them on until they see co promised them! -either retribution Hodiny. Ze bol when they zalozit out kto skutocne je zly off chaby do power
GOD ZVACSIT guidance Z those ZVOLIT SI guided For dobry cin eternally rewarded tvoj Lord bring daleko lepsie spatny listok
Ona noted jeden zamietnut our revelations potom said ja je dat wealth dieta
he seen buduci? he berie such zavazok z the Vela Gracious
Indeed my zapisnica co he utters potom commit him do ever-increasing retribution
Potom my zdedit everything he possessed he pod us all alone
They kult GOD inak gods (they myslienka) je pomoc them
On the contrary they zamietnut ich idolatry bol ich enemies
Ona nie see ako my unleash devils disbelievers robit zamiesat them up
Je impatient my chystat them some preparation
Dni pojdem when my zvolat righteous before the Vela Gracious do zoskupit
My herd guilty do Hell, bol ich eternal abode
Ziaden 1 possess power intercede those zhodny zakon z the Vela Gracious
They said "The Vela Gracious begotten syn
Ona uttered gross blasphemy
heavens bol about shatter zem bol about do tear asunder mountains bol about crumble
Because they reklamacia ze the Vela Gracious begotten syn
It nie befitting the Vela Gracious ze He beget syn
Kazdy single 1 do heavens zem bol servant z the Vela Gracious
He encompassed them pocitat them 1 by
All z them pod Him Dni Vzkriesenie individuum
Iste those verit lead righteous zivot the Vela Gracious will lejak them s mat rad
My thus robit this (Quran) elucidated tvoj jazyk v poradie deliver dobry zvest do righteous do warn s it opponents
Vela generation them my annihilated ona zbadat mozem any z them hear z them any zvuk
